name: SleepNoiseWolfSounds
0:
”Alexa, open sleep noise wolf sounds”
”Alexa, start sleep noise wolf sounds”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise wolf sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise Wolf Sounds lets you reproduce calming audio tracks to make you feel relaxed and fall asleep easier.
To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
